## Introduction

The goal of vse4ts is to identify memory patterns in time series using variance scaling exponent. It constructs variance scaling exponent, achieving the identification of memory patterns in time series, especially long memory.

## Installation

You can install the development version of vse4ts from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("z-my-cn/vse4ts")
```

## Example

Here is a basic example of how to use the `vse` function in the vse4ts package:

``` r
library(vse4ts)
set.seed(123)
x <- rnorm(1024)
x.vse <- vse(x)
print(x.vse)
#> [1] 0.4987233
```

This package also provides a hypothesis test function `vse.test` to test the long memory in time series:

``` r
library(vse4ts)
set.seed(123)
x <- rnorm(1024)
x.vse.test <- vse.test(x)
print(x.vse.test)
#> $statistic
#> [1] 29.06849

#> $df
#> [1] 31

#> $p.value
#> [1] 0.4343341

#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "vsetest"
```
